headline: RFID for packaging enters new markets, despite pause on FDA traceability rule
summary: The tracking technology is pushing into newer applications, including anti-counterfeiting for high-value goods. RFID is poised for notable growth, while innovation helps improve the tech’s operability and ensure recyclability.
